title: Lighting Fast Excel Generator
description: Lighting Fast Excel Generator, a small library which allows to generate simple excel files in fast and efficient way even if you have up to million of rows (that's a limit for one Excel tab)
summary: Lighting Fast Excel Generator, a small library which allows to generate simple excel files in fast and efficient way even if you have up to million of rows (that's a limit for one Excel tab)
releaseNotes: Added documentation for ExcelExportAttribute and ExcelFileGenerator classes.
